translated: Homage to the Venerable Tara.

original: nam zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i tshe //
analyzed: nam zhig 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i tshe //
translated: When the time of death arrives,

original: ltos pa thams cad rab spangs te //

translated: abandon all attachments,

original: ci 'byor mchod pa sngon du bya //
analyzed: ci 'byor mchod pa sngon du bya //
translated: and make offerings to the best of your ability.

original: byang chub sems ni brtan par bsgom //

original: 'byung bzhi thim pa lha bzhir bsgom //
analyzed: 'byung bzhi thim pa lha bzhir bsgom //

original: rnam shes thim pa yid kyi lha //

translated: Meditate on the dissolution of consciousness into the mental deity.

original: 'od gsal la thim 'od gsal te //
analyzed: 'od gsal la thim 'od gsal te //
translated: Meditate on the dissolution of luminosity into luminosity.

original: bskyed rim thim pa rdzogs rim bsgom //
analyzed: bskyed rim thim pa rdzogs rim bsgom //
translated: Meditate on the completion stage of the dissolution of the generation stage.

original: lus kyi shed nyams smig rgyu snang //
analyzed: lus kyi shed nyams smig rgyu snang //
translated: When the strength of the body declines, a mirage appears.

original: snying gar bla ma bsgom par bya //
analyzed: snying gar bla ma bsgom par bya //
translated: Meditate on the guru at the heart.

original: sgo dgu skam sa na du ba 'byung //

original: dbugs chad mar me 'bar ba mthong //

translated: Finally, the two seeds of the parents

original: srog gi sa bon t'am yig blta //
analyzed: srog gi sa bon t'am yig blta //
